public class Fireball extends Enemy
An Enemy that moves horizontally and shoots Bullets in a circle like manner

  • Constructor Details

    • Fireball

      public Fireball(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D location, Player player, int health, GameScreen gameScreen)
      Creates a Fireball to add to a scene
      Parameters:
      location - The location on the sene
      player - The current Player
      health - The current health and the maximum health of the Fireball
      gameScreen - The GameScreen where the Fireball is placed

  • Method Details

    • hit

      public void hit(int damage)
      Do damage to the Fireball and updates the EnemyHealthText. If the Fireball's health is 0 or lower he dies and the Player gets points added to his score
      Overrides:
      hit in class Character
      Parameters:
      damage - The points of damage that needs to be removed from the health

    • setupEntities

      public void setupEntities()
      Sets up sprite of the Fireball and the EnemyHealthText
      Specified by:
      setupEntities in class com.github.hanyaeger.api.entities.CompositeEntity
